idea-plugin.name: Base16 Tokyodark Terminal
idea-plugin.vendor: Tiagovla (https://github.com/tiagovla/), Shirom Makkad, and the Base16 project
idea-plugin.description:
Base 16 Tokyodark Terminal for Jetbrains IDE


---------------


Colors by Tiagovla (https://github.com/tiagovla/). Theme made using base16(https://github.com/chriskempson/base16). Theme generated by Shirom Makkad (https://github.com/ShiromMakkad/base16-jetbrains-ide)
